title: Komori-san wa Kotowarenai! (Komori-san Can't Decline!)
synopsis: Fifteen-year-old Komori Shuri is a junior high school girl who is too nice to decline requests. Constantly doing favors for other people has given her incredible strength?! But even so, she is also an adolescent junior high school girl.
staff: [['Imaizumi, Kenichi', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Key Animation']], ['Kawazoe, Kengo', ['Sound Director']], ['Cool-kyou Shinja', ['Original Creator']], ['Hiraki, Daisuke', ['Editing']]]
